nodes.text: A female individual was the wife of Ambassador Weft of the Dalnans, and the mother of Honesty Weft. A Corellian, she lacked the aversion to space travel and exploration that characterized most of Dalna's inhabitants, and it was her idea for Honesty to accompany his father on a diplomatic journey to the Starlight Beacon space station. Weft usually went along with his wife's requests.
